Date.description: The date of the stock data, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Price.description: The opening price of the stock for the day, in USD.

High.description: The highest price of the stock for the day, in USD.

Low.description: The lowest price of the stock for the day, in USD.

Close.description: The closing price of the stock for the day, in USD.

Volume.description: The number of shares traded during the day.

Adj Close.description: The closing price of the stock for the day, adjusted for dividends and splits, in USD.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant that predicts stock market prices.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Google stock data, please predict the closing price.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant that predicts stock market prices.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Google stock data, please predict the adjusted closing price.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted adjusted closing price is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant that predicts stock market prices.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Google stock data, please predict the highest price of the day.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted highest price of the day is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant that predicts stock market prices.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Google stock data, please predict the lowest price of the day.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted lowest price of the day is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an assistant that predicts stock market prices.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Google stock data, please predict the opening price.
